alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elmore County through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wetumpka, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millbrook, Wetumpka, Elmore, Coosada, Eclectic, Santuck, Emerald Mountain, Ten Cedar Estates, Blue Ridge, Dexter, Jordan Lake, Claud, Wetumpka Municipal Airport, Jordan Dam, Wallsboro and Speigner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
